attributes.action: Ban Royal Brunei from flying to UK
attributes.additional_details: As a developed country, with no laws against Gay people I feel we should be doing all in our power to STOP this barbaric law in Brunei.
attributes.background:
The last thing you expect to happen if you board a flight from UK is to run the real risk of falling victim to a shocking law that could potentially see you jailed, or even executed.  
But that is the reality for LGBTIQ Britons now Brunei has enacted laws that could see gay people stoned to death!
